programme.title: A Perfect Christmas Pairing
programme.desc: After a bad review from a food critic, renowned chef Grace Cooke returns home for Christmas and reconnects with her roots.

programme.title: Saving Christmas Spirit
programme.desc: An archaeologist lets Christmas magic into her heart and finds both history and love.

programme.title: A Merry Single Christmas
programme.desc: A woman attempts to rekindle her Christmas spirit, but things get complicated when her ex shows up.

programme.title: A Perfect Christmas Pairing
programme.desc: After a bad review from a food critic, renowned chef Grace Cooke returns home for Christmas and reconnects with her roots.

programme.title: Being Erica
programme.desc: Erica's latest therapy session has uncovered a shocking secret; Dr. Tom has a time-altering solution.

programme.title: Being Erica
programme.desc: Erica is offered an incredible career opportunity.

programme.title: Being Erica
programme.desc: Erica and Adam confront their true feelings.

programme.title: Love Afloat
programme.desc: When Lorelei inherits a run-down sailboat from a distant relative, she hires Rob to fix it up for her and sail it from the Caribbean to Miami. Despite a culture clash, sparks fly between them.

programme.title: Finding Love in Saint Lucia
programme.desc: An Ornithologist and a Journalist partner up to save an endangered bird species in the jungle of Saint Lucia. They immediately fall in love with the nature, and in the process, they also fall for each other.

programme.title: Eat, Love, London
programme.desc: All Stella wants is take over her small, family run restaurant in the U.S. and marry her long-term boyfriend. However, when everything she thought was certain falls apart, she takes an opening for a chef in a new London restaurant.

programme.title: Love Map
programme.desc: A self-assured relationship columnist who is about to launch a dating app is sent on assignment with a prickly tour guide to create a real map of the most romantic places in Florida.

programme.title: A European Christmas
programme.desc: When Christmas movie director Ivy has another 'heartless' flop, she seeks the star of her debut hit in snowy Serbia. Despite refusing to return, he shows her the wonder of Serbian Christmas.

programme.title: Christmas in Scotland
programme.desc: On vacation in Scotland, a New York installation designer is tasked with helping a small, rural community compete in a "Best Christmas Village" festival. She is forced to work with a wealthy, heir who sees Christmas as an inconvenience.

programme.title: A Very English Christmas
programme.desc: Christmas in the English countryside isn't in Emma's plans until her sister, Amy, plans her wedding for Christmas eve. Dylan, Amy's Christmas market co-owner, teams up with Emma to bring order to the whirlwind wedding.

programme.title: A Very Corgi Christmas
programme.desc: When workaholic Lauren and her son Jacob return home for the holidays, her hopes for a quiet visit are quickly dashed when she runs into Ben.

programme.title: Waking Up to Christmas
programme.desc: On the verge of a massive deadline, a cynical workaholic must turn Christmas around in her small town after a small mishap.
